alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 4:00PM MDT until June 26 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Fallon County in southeastern Montana... East central Custer County in southeastern Montana... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 359 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 25 miles south of Fallon, or 25 miles southeast of Terry, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, 60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Localized flooding on roads. * Locations impacted include... Ismay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
